context: SaaS company launching new AI-powered analytics feature, needing to determine pricing strategy for enterprise vs SMB markets

request.purpose: New AI analytics feature pricing model
request.justification: Competitive differentiation in crowded analytics market, expected 40% feature adoption rate

decision_process.outcome: Identified $50/user/month as optimal enterprise price point
Consensus reached on value-based pricing approach with 90-day trial period

business_impact.expected_outcome: 15% increase in average deal size, 25% improvement in sales cycle efficiency

lessons_learned: Early customer input crucial for pricing acceptance, tiered model provides flexibility for different market segments
